(row = 7, col = 1)
=== Last Position ===
(row = 7, col = 1)

To make a move, I need to analyze the current position and what options are available. My avatar (`a`) is currently at (7, 1). There is a quick monster (`#`) right below me at (8, 1) and a floor space (.) to the right at (7, 2).

Since I cannot move down due to the monster directly below (which would result in a loss), my best option is to move right to (7, 2).

I'll choose the action to move right:

``` Action: 2 ```
This move avoids danger from the monster and allows me to continue exploring the map while looking for boxes to transform.
